name: Vivek Porush
body:
### Welcome to My Documentation Page.
This Page lists documentation for my Git projects. These documentations are available under same license as of their respective source codes (GNU AFFERO GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE). Files are grouped in following subdomains:

* Analog Resources
* Digital Resources
* Computer Architecture Resources
* Publications And Research Work

### Analog Resources
Click Appropriate project name to download its documentation.

1. [Audio Amplifier](https://github.com/VivekPorush/VivekPorush.github.io/tree/gh-pages/Audio%20Amplifier): A 4 watt dual channel Audio Amplifier with led display for volume control. 
2. [LPF using MOS Active Resistor](https://github.com/VivekPorush/VivekPorush.github.io/tree/gh-pages/LPF%20using%20MOS%20Active%20Resistor): Passive resistors are not preferred for ON CHIP fabrication, due to their large area. This project implement Active Resistor using MOS technology. These resistors can be economically fabricated on IC's.
3. [Comparator](https://github.com/VivekPorush/VivekPorush.github.io/tree/gh-pages/Comparator): Basic Comparator circuit using LM 741 comparator.
4. [LPF & HPF First Order](https://github.com/VivekPorush/VivekPorush.github.io/tree/gh-pages/Low%20Pass%20Filter%20%26%20High%20Pass%20Filter): First order filters using LM 741 Op-Amp.

### Digital Resources
Soon!!!


### Computer Architecture Resources
Soon!!!

### Publications And Research Work
1. [Loss Less Microwave Devices using SWP](http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/login.jsp?tp=&arnumber=6216073&url=http%3A%2F%2Fieeexplore.ieee.org%2Fiel5%2F6204370%2F6215562%2F06216073.pdf%3Farnumber%3D6216073) : Appears in IEEE-ICAESM 2012.
2. [Performance Evaluation and Improvements in Floating Point Computation] () : Appears in Advance Computer Architecture- University of Illinois At Chicago.

### Authors and Contributors
These projects are listed on Github (@VivekPorush). My Contact information, other work and publications can be found at [My site] (https://sites.google.com/site/vivekporush91/).

### Enjoy Open-Source
Open-source is a collaborative work of researchers, engineers, programmers and people just like you who love to create stuff. Please respect open-source licenses and contribute to open source community.

Happy Open-Sourcing.

[Mail Me] (mailto:vivek.91.porush@gmail.com)
